vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Lim & Associates, Inc. to provide land surveying services for approximately 61 parcels identified by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers for the Dallas Levee System - Not to exceed $1,930,820.00 - Financing:  Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
